text: Aishwarya Raj Bhakuni, also known as Aishwarya Raj, is an Indian actress who is known for her appearance as Sugandha in TV show Tenali Rama of Sab TV. ==Personal life== Aishwarya Raj Bhakuni was born in Bhopal, soon relocated to Raipur, Chattisgarh and completed her schooling there. Later she moved to Chennai to pursue her bachelor's in Electronics & Telecommunication from SRM Institute of Science and Technology. She decided to work as an actress and shifted to Mumbai. She is also a trained Kathak dancer. ==Career== Aishwarya Raj started her career with a Tamil music video. She has acted in many TV serials ever since. She has featured in web series as well.
